<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Delete Saved Asset Inventory Filter</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/filter/inventory/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Deletes the saved asset inventory filter with the specified ID.

## Request

successful operation

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

failed_add_inventory_saved_filter

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"403"} value={"403"}><div>

not_owner_or_same_role

</div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
